Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Enacts the "New Century Libraries: Libraries 2019 act"
Summary: Enacts the "New Century Libraries; Libraries 2019 act"; increases the apportionment of state aid to libraries and library services throughout the state; provides for adult and family literacy grants; authorizes the commissioner to provide grants and expend monies on a variety of library programs and services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "New Century Libraries: Libraries 2019 act"
